ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course introduced students to the many different facets of RNAs, including miRNA, siRNA, and lncRNAs. I would recommend this to another student because it was very interactive.
It is a great way to learn a lot about an emerging field from the direct sources that are at the forefront of this field. I would definitely recommend this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course deepened my knowledge of the applicability of RNAs to have functional roles besides being used for protein translation. It did not directly contribute to my research.
I wil definitely try to incorporate some of the concepts and ideas from this field into my own research.
